name: Ignacio Paradisi
title: Senior Mobile Software Engineer
profile: Skilled Senior Software Engineer with seven years of experience in iOS development using Swift and SwiftUI, adept in integrating REST and GraphQL services. Familiar with architectural patterns such as Clean Architecture, MVVM, MVC, and TDD as well as cross-platform development with Flutter.

I thrive in collaborative environments and am deeply committed to contributing my comprehensive background in both native and cross-platform mobile application development to create high-quality products with exceptional user experiences.

experience.title: Senior Mobile Engineer
experience.description: Work closely with product and design teams to deliver high-quality user experiences, contributing to the app's core 'Transfer Out' flow—the most used feature enabling users to access their earnings. Develop iOS features using SwiftUI, UIKit, and MVVM, ensuring clean architecture and precise design implementation. Conduct A/B tests and other experiments to measure user behavior and optimize experiences that drive business impact.

experience.title: Staff Software Engineer
experience.description: Spearheaded the development of a Flutter app from scratch, designed to render a server-driven UI. By employing reusable components alongside MVVM, Clean Architecture and GraphQL, I ensured a well-structured and maintainable codebase.

experience.title: Engineering Lead
experience.description: Established a close collaboration with the product and the developer teams, acting as a bridge to ensure clear communication and alignment on goals. A significant milestone during my tenure was leading the successful migration of an entire app from iOS to Android.

experience.title: iOS Developer
experience.description: As one of the pioneering iOS Developers at Kavak, I played a pivotal role in laying the foundation of the mobile application landscape within the organization. My contributions spanned from developing several internal applications to engaging in backend development.

experience.title: iOS Developer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of Pictune, an app that uniquely blends music with images.

projects.title: Fluire
projects.description: Developed a personal finance application for iOS using Swift and SwiftUI, integrating CoreData and CloudKit for data management. The application provides users with comprehensive control over their expenses, enabling clear visibility into financial habits. Ensured secure and private data storage. Available on the App Store.
